title: Medium term forecast for global fertilizer demand by nutrient to 2023
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 3 lines denoting Urea (CH4N2O), Phosphorus pentoxide (P2O5), and Potassium oxide (K2O). The y axis indicates the Demand in million metric tons and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall Urea (CH4N2O), Phosphorus pentoxide (P2O5), and Potassium oxide (K2O) are roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Urea (CH4N2O), 2. Phosphorus pentoxide (P2O5), and lastly, 3. Potassium oxide (K2O).
Overall across the Year, Urea (CH4N2O) mostly maintained the highest Demand in million metric tons when compared to others with a mean value of 184.0, and it peaked at 2023.
Followed by Phosphorus pentoxide (P2O5) which ranks as the second topmpost line , with an average of 63.9 Demand in million metric tons,reaching its highest point  at 2023 with a value of 63.9.
The botommost line, Potassium oxide (K2O),  has a mean of 45.7, and peaked at 2023.
